entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
